VisitorGenerator.PluginDescription: Create fake visits and actions. Can be used by Matomo users or developers to generate fake data to populate Matomo reports.
VisitorGenerator.Warning: You are about to generate fake visits to be recorded in your Matomo database.
VisitorGenerator.NotReversible: It will %1$snot%2$s be possible to easily delete these visits from the Matomo logs.
VisitorGenerator.ChoiceYes: Yes, add made-up data to the database.
VisitorGenerator.GenerateFakeActions: This will generate at least %d fake actions on this site for each day.
VisitorGenerator.OverwriteLogFiles: You can overwrite the log files used to generate fake visits (change or add files in %s). Requests are logged to "matomo.php" in the "Apache combined log" format. Plugin developers can provide their own log files by placing '*.log' files within a "data" directory of their plugin.
VisitorGenerator.PleaseBePatient: Note: It might take a few minutes to generate visits and actions, please be patientâ€¦
VisitorGenerator.LogImporterNote: There is also a faster tool that will import large test data in Matomo, as described in the %1$sREADME%2$s.
VisitorGenerator.AutomaticReprocess: The reports will be reprocessed the next time you visit the Matomo reports. It might take a few minutes to do.
VisitorGenerator.GeneratedVisitsFor: Generated visits for %1$s and for the last %2$s days
VisitorGenerator.ReRunArchiveScript: Please re-run the crontab './console core:archive' command to refresh the reports. %1$sMore details in "How to Set up Auto-Archiving of Your Reports"%2$s
VisitorGenerator.CliToolUsage: By using the %1$sMatomo CLI tool%2$s you can not only generate even more visits, but also users, websites, and goals.
VisitorGenerator.ConfirmVisitorGeneration: Please confirm the visitor generation by ticking the box
